data.title: University of Colorado Athletics
data.meta_description: Chazz Wallace (52) Defensive Line - AT COLORADO (2023) Played in 10 games, starting in the final four games of the season. Recorded 11 total tackles, and 1.5...
data.text:
AT COLORADO (2023)

Played in 10 games, starting in the final four games of the season.

Recorded 11 total tackles, and 1.5 total sacks on the season.

Posted career-high five tackles against Utah in the final game of the year.

TRANSFER RANKINGS

Rated as a three-star prospect in the transfer portal by 247, which rated him at .8500. He was ranked as the No. 730 overall player in the portal and the No. 78 Defensive Tackle.

He came to Colorado with two years to play two.

AT OLD DOMINION (2021-22)

Played in 23 career games throughout two seasons at Old Dominion totaling 45 tackles, two and a half sacks, and four tackles for a loss.

Played in 10 games, earning his first career start at Georgia State. Registered 19 tackles, two tackles for loss, half a sack, and a blocked kick.

Appeared in all 13 games during his freshman season at defensive tackle and totaled 26 tackles and two sacks.

HIGH SCHOOL RANKINGS

A three-star prospect by the recruiting services.

ESPN ranked him the No. 122 defensive tackle and the No. 48 player from Maryland.

On3 listed him as the No. 1.957 player in the country, the No. 160 defensive tackle, and the No. 52 player from Maryland.

247 Sports ranked him as the No. 156 defensive tackle and the No. 50 player from Maryland.

247 Composite listed him as the No. 2,166 player in the country, the No. 156 defensive tackle, and the No. 53 player from Maryland.

AT THE AVALON SCHOOL

Played high school football for head coach Tyree Spinner at The Avalon School in Maryland.

In his high school career he recorded 72 tackles for loss, 45 sacks, eight pass breakups and an interception.

Played for the United States National Under-19 team in the International Bowl.
